sentences.sContent: When spring is coming all trees begin to burgeon .
sentences.sContent_eng: When spring is coming all trees begin to burgeon .
sentences.sCn: 当春天到来的时候，所有树开始发芽。

sentences.sContent: The brain-drain effect of studying abroad has started to burgeon due to flaws in the domestic academic environment.
sentences.sContent_eng: The brain-drain effect of studying abroad has started to burgeon due to flaws in the domestic academic environment.
sentences.sCn: 由于国内学术环境恶劣，出国留学造成人才外流的现象已经初显萌芽。

sentences.sContent: The seed of friendship and cooperation we sow today will burgeon and harvest in the future and China-US partnership of cooperation will definitely enjoy a better tomorrow.
sentences.sContent_eng: The seed of friendship and cooperation we sow today will burgeon and harvest in the future and China-US partnership of cooperation will definitely enjoy a better tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 我们今天播下的友好合作种子一定能够生根发芽、开花结果，中美合作伙伴关系一定能够迎来更加美好的明天。

remMethod.val: burg(=bud花蕾) + eon → 迅速成长； burg本身是单词， 意为“城， 镇” → 成长的地方 → 发展
